message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the decrease in amounts owed to the entity for goods or services sold on credit.

In a cash flow statement, "Accounts Receivable" represents money owed to the company by customers who purchased goods or services on credit. When we see "(Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable" in the cash flow statement, this shows how this amount has changed during the period.

Looking at the problem:
- The line "(Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable" shows a value of -1502354.84
- The negative value indicates an increase in accounts receivable (more money is owed to the company)
- Since we need to identify the decrease, this is the relevant line item

The value is -1502354.84, which represents an increase in accounts receivable (or a decrease in cash due to more outstanding credit). This is precisely the figure we need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-1502354.84'}}
```
